La obra magna de Maxis en la saga SIMCITY, gracias a esta serie de juegos tenemos al día de hoy a Los Sims.

Lo recomiendo muchisimo ya que apesar de los años se puede notar que es un city builder muy bien hecho.
Recomiendo ver tutoriales de como jugar ya que no es el tipico city builder, me tarde unas 3 ciudades en enteder porque no crecian mis ganancias.

184925400.review: In my eyes this is the pinnacle of simcity -- absolutely loved playing this 9 years ago. Even in a post cities skylines world, this game still has plenty of charm and unique features. It's been fun to aimlessly play although it is a NIGHTMARE to setup potentially on modern systems with the essential bugfixes, NAM, and a directx wrapper thrown into the mix along with the fact that its UI doesn't scale well with higher resolutions that you have to mod in. I find 1366x768 to be a good balance for a widescreen resolution to run in windowed mode to which I can then fullscreen upscale it. Thankfully this game still has a strong online forum and modding presence, so you can find workarounds to your problems eventually although it's quite tedious. It's never going to happen what with the dissolution of maxis essentially & the greediness of modern EA -- but I'd go crazy for a passionate remaster with a new expansion. Really liked it all those years ago & I still do.

184874996.review: I used top play these games when I was much much younger. This was so much fun! It's relaxing and I just love watching the city grow and change. Little difficult to get used to the systems but not a road block, lol, dad joke.

184869235.review: Habiendo jugado muchos simuladores de creador de Ciudades, este sin duda es el mejor y siempre tiene ese factor nostalgia que lo ha ha hecho envejecer bastante bien. Aun es un juego bastante disfrutable aun cuando has jugado otros como Cities Skylines, este tiene sus propias dinámicas que no han sido repetidas y lo siguen haciendo un juego único y genial.

184711047.review: I absolutely love this game. I think it’s the best SimCity overall for me. I had a huge city and spawned a tornado, causing mass destruction. But overall, this game is super fun. I know some people encounter issues like crashing, which could be related to compatibility with certain hardware, but even with those issues, I still think the game is great. However, I’d recommend getting it when it’s on sale, as $20 for an older game like this can be hard to justify, especially with City Skylines 1 and City Skylines 2 out there.

184303597.review:
Ok for any newer computer users, definitely use the advanced launch options and the game works normally without crashing.

Here's an advanced launch thingy I found off of reddit that worked for me
-d:soft -intro:off -CPUCount:1 -f -CustomResolution:enabled -r1920x1080x32 -w

184168987.review: Happy this was released on Steam. Played many hours over the years and found it to be easily the best of the sim city games, totally addictive.

184078741.review:
SimCity 4 é aquele clássico que todo mundo que curte jogos de gerenciamento deveria experimentar. Mesmo sendo um jogo de 2003, ele ainda mantém um lugar especial no coração de muitos jogadores. A música, os gráficos... tudo remete a uma época mais simples dos games, onde as empresas eram ambiciosas, inovadoras e o maior propósito de um jogo era o quanto ele poderia te divertir.

A liberdade que SimCity 4 oferece é sensacional. Quer criar uma cidadezinha tranquila ou uma metrópole cheia de vida? Você decide. A sensação de controlar cada detalhe, desde as estradas até o fornecimento de água, torna a experiência única. A mecânica de expansão regional é um dos maiores destaques, permitindo gerenciar várias cidades que interagem entre si, isso abre um leque enorme de possibilidades e desafios.

O nível de detalhe carinho envolvidos nesse jogo impressiona até hoje. O transporte, a gestão de recursos e as zonas urbanas interagindo tornam tudo muito estratégico, acredite, há jogos de gerenciamento recentes com gráficos incríveis que não conseguem oferecer tudo o que este jogo proporciona. Nem a própria EA conseguiria reproduzir essa obra de arte novamente. E ainda nem cheguei a mencionar a comunidade de mods, um show à parte! Os mods mantêm o jogo atualizado e cheio de novidades, trazendo sempre algo novo para explorar.

184053426.review: Just a fun game. Do the tutorials.

183985965.review: Classic Sin City fun. Need to edit the exe file to play

183809662.review:
After all of these years, this game is still better than any of the new city simulation games.  Maxis was solid when it came to Sim City.  I still play this game today.  It would be awesome if a remastered version was created just to update the graphics to the new 4K abilities.  The games economic engine in no way needs to be tinkered with.  It functions very well.  

I score this game 10 out of 10
